title: Our Services
subtitle: Comprehensive dental care for the whole family

items.title: Scaling
items.description: Professional scaling for a bright smile! Removal of stubborn tartar and plaque, with advice on maintaining oral hygiene.

items.title: Cavity treatment
items.description: Professional care to stop cavity progression and restore dental health using modern techniques.

items.title: Initial periodontal treatment
items.description: Specialized treatment for gum disease to preserve oral health and prevent complications.

items.title: Implant consultation
items.description: Expert evaluation and advice for dental implants to replace missing teeth with functional solutions.

items.title: Pregnancy check-up
items.description: Specialized dental care adapted for pregnant women, ensuring the safety of maternal and fetal oral health.

items.title: Root canal
items.description: Advanced techniques to remove infected pulp, clean and seal teeth to prevent reinfection.

items.title: Adult and child check-ups
items.description: Comprehensive examinations for all ages to prevent dental problems and maintain optimal oral health.

items.title: Wisdom teeth
items.description: Safe and painless extraction of wisdom teeth to eliminate discomfort and prevent future problems.
